subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams can become a free agent on Sunday and the Nets, who don’t have a first-round pick in Thursday’s N.B.A. draft, are desperately trying to re-sign their star guard.
snippet: Deron Williams can become a free agent on Sunday and the Nets, who don’t have a first-round pick in Thursday’s N.B.A. draft, are desperately trying to re-sign their star guard.
